meanings.definition: A doctor who specializes in the medical care of children.
meanings.sent1: The paediatricians at the hospital are experts in treating kids.
meanings.sent2: Parents often take their children to paediatricians for check-ups.
meanings.sent3: Why did the clown go to the paediatricians? To get a check-up for his silly bone!
meanings.sent4: The paediatricians are like superheroes for kids, always ready to heal with a smile.
meanings.sent5: The colourful clinic of the paediatricians is a cheerful place for young patients.

meanings.definition: The practice of medicine concerned with the physical, emotional, and social health of children.
meanings.sent1: Paediatricians focus on ensuring children grow up healthy and happy.
meanings.sent2: Studying paediatricians involves learning about child development and well-being.
meanings.sent3: The party for the teddy bears was organized by the paediatricians to promote healthy play!
meanings.sent4: In the garden of healthcare, paediatricians are the nurturing flowers for the little buds.
meanings.sent5: The laughter echoing in the halls of the paediatricians' office brings joy to all.
